ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He laid out the earth for all living creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He positioned the earth for all the creatures:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And He has set up the earth for all beings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He spread out the earth for the people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And He appointed the earth for the creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the earth He has put down (laid) for Al-An'am.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the earth, He has set it for living creatures;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And earth -- He set it down for all beings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the earth hath He appointed for (His) creatures,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He has laid out the earth for His creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the earth! He hath lain it out for the creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the earth—He laid it out for mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is He Who has spread out the earth for (His) creatures:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the earth He has put for the creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He set down the earth for the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the earth; He set up for the creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:10] And the earth, He placed it, He fixed it [in place], for [all] creatures: man, jinn and others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the earth hath He appointed) He spread it on the water (for (His) creatures) for all created beings whether dead or alive,
